name: DaGhostman Official Blog
tagline: Random thoughts, experiences and something else
body:
### Welcome to my Blog.
Hey all! I will be doing this blog for the sake of sharing my experiences during working on private projects, freelancing and/or random things that happen. A bit about me you ask..? Well I am PHP Developer and Ubuntu fan (aren't we all). Most of the time I try to improve myself in professional perspective and in generally as a person.

I live in London, UK (if you want drop me a line and we might get a pint or two) from almost 5 years now (written in 2015) and I'm originally from Bulgaria (Здравей :)). I'm 22 years old, very friendly and helpful, but a bit shy overall, [spoiler](http://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0149/3544/products/just-shy_shirt_3_1024x1024.png?v=1417629469).

### Contact
Twitter: [@DaGhostman_](https://twitter.com/DaGhostman_)

Email: **daghostman[dot]dd** or **daghostman[dot]dimitrov** @gmail.com

StackOverflow: [DaGhostman Dimitrov](http://stackoverflow.com/users/1747193/daghostman-dimitrov)

GitHub: [@DaGhostman](https://github.com/DaGhostman)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
